185501.name: StormWinds: The Lost Campaigns
185501.description:
We consider StormWinds: The Lost Campaigns to be a glorified expansion pack to the first popular shooter released a year ago. With 6 new campaigns, all new enemies, weapons, and more, there is plenty to keep players busy. It also explains more of the StormWinds story and sheds some light on this steampunkish universe.
Similar to StormWinds 1.5, you must defend your fortress from the oncoming enemy waves. Place turrets in locations of your choice on your fortress, creating the best defense possible to withhold even the greatest of attacks. Purchase, Repair, upgrade, and move your turrets to find the ultimate defense.

Source: The Game Website.

185502.name: Brute Wars 2
185502.description:
Sequel to the 6 on 6 strategy battle game. Assemble your team of animals, battle enemies, raise levels, buy, sell and find powerful items to aid in your quest. The unique formation-based combat system from the original game has been enhanced with new abilities for you and your enemies.

Source: The Game Website.

185503.name: Brute Wars
185503.description:
Assemble a team of animal warriors to battle to the top of Mt. Asio. Unique turn-based battle system. Strategy/puzzle hybrid with some RPG elements.
1.1 update: Added stat tracking, addressed a few possible balance issues. Attempted to rework the Shadow creatures a bit. Comments and suggestions welcome.

185504.description:
The year is 2112 and the machines being produced now run on quintessence, a fully renewable energy source held in Spirits. In 2040, Dr. Russel VanOrman Quine discovered that Spirits contain energy that can never be destroyed. Even when used to power heavy machinery, this energy source (quintessence) dissipates into the ether, returning to its unknown source. All we need to do is collect it.

You have just been hired by B.E.E.net to collect Bound Ethereal Energy Spirits (B.E.E.S.). Seems simple? Just find B.E.E.S. wandering around in any haunted manor and grab them with your VanOrman Machine aka “H.I.V.E.” (Held Intensity Vitality Extractor). The main issue is a H.I.V.E. needs to be exactly Arrayed to grab a Spirit by joining Tubes to match it. Of course there may be some side effects. So... BEE careful.

Holding Spirits makes a H.I.V.E. rise in Pressure and Tubes may leak. A failed Tube can lead to the unbinding of the Spirit and the Tubes must be trashed. The Spirit is released back into the unknown perhaps to be rebound another day.

Also keep in mind that although Spirit collectors work together, you must all fill your quota each day or you may lose your jobs! Alternatively, an especially good harvest may get your pictures on the wall at headquarters.

B.E.E.S. can be played cooperatively or competitively, and the cooperative game can be played with one player. Your goal in the cooperative game is to collect a quota of Spirits and Quintessence, and your goal in the competitive game is to have the most Quintessence when the game ends. To collect a Spirit and acquire its Quintessence, you must build an Array with Tube cards from your hand and pass both an Array test and a Pressure test. When you collect a Spirit, it goes into your H.I.V.E. and affects you Pressure. Players must manage their hand of Tubes and decide how to build their Array while balancing the board state when deciding which Spirit to target. Gameplay is relatively simple, but the nuances in your decisions determine your level of risk vs. reward and can also greatly affect the other players.
185504.name: B.E.E.S.

185505.name: Mytheria
185505.description:
A sci-fi card game. Defeat your opponents with creatures and spells, test strategies, and build your own decks.

Source: The Game Website.

185506.name: Alpha Force (2007)
185506.description:
A good old fashioned side scrolling shoot ‘em up. It’s a bti old and there are a fair few things I’d like to change about it, but I still really like it. Maybe one day I’ll do a sequel.

Source: The Game Website.

185507.name: Alpha Force (2015)
185507.description:
Warp to the Cyberworld and take on this evil computer virus before it is too late!

Source: The Game Website.

185508.name: Battle for Blood
185508.description:
Constant fun and excitement! Bloody fighting from the start. Epic battles within 30 seconds. An all-new game type is coming!

Are you ready to start a war? Our Knights, soldiers, and even our farmers are ready to go! Lead us into the devils lair!

• Fun, and easy to play! Match tiles to summon soldiers. Explosive fun!
• Epic battlefield experience for casual gamers! Truly epic battles, fierce engagements!
• Choose your army for battle! How strategic can you be?
• 12 kinds of soldier. Upgrade and fight with any combination of soldier you want!
• 5 special items to help keep you alive!
• 60 levels to battle through, New ones coming soon! You will love it!
• Variety of challenging monsters at every stage, INTENSE BOSS LEVELS!!
…..

You think you have the time to sit through this introduction?

Your hero has to get going! See you on the battlefield!

Source: The Game Website.

185509.name: Words Warriors
185509.description:
A short and unique game, based on a previous prototype published here, with improved graphics and puzzles. Still short, still sweet :)

UPDATE!!!
We included some simple integration with the Kongregate API and removed some sounds (YES, WE REMOVED THAT SOUND!). Also, attempted something different with the looks, let us know if you like it better this way!

Source: The Game Website.

185510.name: Doodle God Blitz
185510.description:
The Power of Creation in Your Hands – Doodle God is Back & Better Than Ever!
The original flash version of Doodle God was launched in 2010.
Doodle God Blitz is a new version that has many new features:
- New “Planet Mode” where you can see your planet come alive as you play,
- New Elements and Episodes,
- New Game Modes (Quests, Puzzles, Artifacts),
- And now the game is available in 13 different languages!
IMPORTANT NOTE: The game is completely free to play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money (premium Puzzles and Quests, for example). There are no pay walls in the game.
Mix and match different combinations of fire, earth, water and air to create an entire universe! Of course the universe was not created in a day. You’ll have to work your up from a simple microorganism to create animals, tools, storms and even build armies before you have what it takes to build the universe!
Unleash Your Inner God with Doodle God™!

Source: The Game Website.

185511.name: Doodle God 2
185511.description:
The long awaited sequel from creators of Doodle God/Devil series is here!
Doodle God 2 developed by JoyBits Ltd features improved reactions set, tons of funny quotes, two additional episodes of gameplay and updated graphics. The ultimate World Creation experience work your way up, all the way from bacteria and beetles, to clay and ceramics, to tools, weapons and beyond. But beware, creating a whole world is not so easy – inventing the wheel might just end in a plague of zombies. Unleash your inner god with Doodle God 2!

Source: The Game Website.

185512.name: Specter Knight
185512.description:
Specter Knight is an action, adventure, Rpg, rogue-like with a plethora of loot, upgrades, spells, enemies and bosses.

Short Description:
In a world without need of heroes, a darkness threatens the living.Your legend now long forgotten and your spirit cursed to forever remain in the halls of your final battle. Will you return to the world of the living one last time?

Features:
- 5+ Hours of game play
- Randomly Generated Dungeons
- 18 unique enemies
- 4 Unique & Challenging Bosses
- 16 levels
- 3 Game Save Slots
- Simplistic Controls (Mouse or keys)
- Loot
- In-game spell and equipment shop
- 80+ Upgrades
- 16+ Unique Spells
- Experience Point System
- Upgradable Strength
- Upgradable Spells/Magic
- Upgradable Health

Source: The Game Website.

185513.name: Specter Knights
185513.description:
You have crashed.
You are stranded.
But you are not alone.
The Spiral Knights have awoken on an alien world. Their equipment stores have been raided and their starship, The Skylark, will not recover from the crash. Now they must work together to survive on a journey that will take them to the very core of the world.

Source: The Game Website.

185514.name: Immense Army
185514.description:
Only the strongest army will achieve glory! Crush goblin armies, train new units, collect treasure, mine for gold, and do anything you can to build an immense army in this idle strategy game!

Source: The Game Website.

185515.name: Lionheart Tactics
185515.description:
Rally your Heroes! Plan every move in this tactical RPG with stunning 3D graphics. Adventure across the realm or take your fight online to challenge the world.

Source: The Game Website.

185516.name: Captain Zorro
185516.description:
Human’s Mars colony where attacked by aliens from faraway planet “Zorgius”. Legendary captain Zorro take off to rescue colony from invaders. Help him to defeat all enemies and release colonists

Source: The Game Website.

185517.name: Captain Zorro: Last Hope
185517.description:
The near future. Super computer took authority for Mars. In order to free the planet you need to destroy that computer. Help Captain Zorro to pass all labyrinths which under guard by combat robots and free the colony on Mars.

Source: The Game Website.

185518.name: Captain Zorro: The Secret Lab
185518.description:
The Earth is in danger again! Evil aliens and insidious robots have built a secret laboratory and are going to create a heavy-duty bomb to smash the Earth into pieces. Only one man can destroy the lab and break the invaders’ cunning plan – it’s Captain Zorro. Hundreds of traps won’t be able to stop a hero armed with deadly blaster and dazzling smile!

Source: The Game Website.

185519.name: Captain Zorro: Lost Factory
185519.description:
The factory which builds robot-killers was uncovered on the lost planet. And evil plans was scheduled by it’s creators. Captain Zorro get the order to kill enemy factory and save the world.

Source: The Game Website.

185520.name: Bubble Tanks
185520.description:
You are a bubble tank fighting other bubble tanks and collecting bubbles, all within an even larger bubblefield.
Nothing but clean, wholesome, bubble fun.
At only about 320 kb, this little game is able to generate and maintain over 8000 battlefields and 37,000 enemies.

Source: The Game Website.

185521.name: Bubble Tanks 2
185521.description:
Similar to BT1, you must travel through giant bubbles, destroying enemy tanks and taking their bubbles to fuel your growth. As you grow, you constantly evolve and get ever better weapons. In the end, you’ll have to face the ultimate adversary and defeat it to win the game.
This game has been in development for a long time and I’m proud to finally release it! It has FAR more content than the first game- 26 unique tank states, over 30 weapons, and over 50 enemy types! Hundreds of comments on the first game have been considered in the development of this better version!
Thanks to everyone who has supported us in this and all our games!

Source: The Game Website.

185522.name: Bubble Tanks 1.5 TD
185522.description:
The massive update to Bubble Tanks Tower Defense is here! This neat upgrade delivers a lot of new and fancy content:

4 New Tower Types: Beam, Poison, Self-Destruct, and Confusion. Each of these towers can be included to make Mega Towers, including a new Mega Beam Tower! Yes, Mega Mega Beam Towers are possible as well.
4 New Enemy Types: EMP, Stealth, Swarm, and Cursed!
15 Brand New Maps!
All the original 50 maps have been updated to include the new enemy types and re-tweaked! Try beating them all over again!
A new Dark Mode (think FML mode) where you can only see a small area around the mouse!
You can now turn off the auto-pause via the Settings menu.
If you’re wondering how to get to the new towers, pause from in-game to see the new upgrade tree with descriptions and stats. *
I’m particularly a fan of trying to beat levels with BOTH FML and Dark modes turned on! :) Give it a try… At any rate, thank you again to all our fans for your support!

Source: The Game Website.

185523.name: Bubble Tanks 3
185523.description:
Bubble Tanks 1 was designed around some simple concepts: make a game that 1) allowed you to grow, 2) explore and constantly experience new things, and 3) choose your difficulty as you play by deciding how far out you want to go. Bubble Tanks 3 is the completion of that vision- New tanks will stream into your game seamlessly in the background creating a new experience and adventure each and every game.
I can’t begin to tell you how much blood and sweat went into this game, but I can sum it up best with a story about our team member Jason. This past Sunday Jason was driving 2 hours from his girlfriend’s place to come in to work. Michigan is very cold, and his truck hit a patch of ice and he rolled the truck over. He was upside down for 10 minutes until the police and medics could cut him out of his truck. He was alright, no scratches or bruises somehow, so when the medic asked him where to drop him off, instead of the hospital he said “Hero Interactive so I can work on Bubble Tanks!” I tell you this for two reasons: 1) God saved Jason so he could bring you this game. 2) That’s how hard we ALL worked on it.
We hope you all enjoy it!

Source: The Game Website.

185524.name: Bubble Tanks Tower Defense
185524.description:
Bubble Tanks Tower Defense takes Hero’s popular series into new genres and beyond! With 7 enemy types, over 11 unique tower paths, tower merging allowing for mega towers and mega-mega towers (the size of 16 towers combined!), and 52 whopping game modes, we’re pretty sure you’ll have plenty to keep you busy until the release of Bubble Tanks Arenas. :) If that’s not enough for you, just check the “FML” checkbox from level select and prepare to get your world rocked… er… blocked.

Source: The Game Website.

185525.name: Stratego Dice Game
185525.description: Stratego Dice Game is a two-player dice game, with each player having five dice, one red and the other blue. Each die is different, and on each turn each player tries to choose the right die; they then roll off to see who wins and who loses (or whether the battle is a draw). The used dice are placed on the side, then players start a new turn. Whoever first wins five battles wins the game!

185526.name: Asteroids Revenge III - Crash to Survive
185526.description:
Defend yourself and other innocent asteroids from the human threat!
25 Levels, Boss, Power-ups… good fun!
Funny intro animation / story (in my biased opinion)
Tutorial built into the game
BADGE – 7000 frames is equal to 3:53 shown on the scores. The speed of your computer does not affect this calculation.
25 levels, final boss, followed by a free-for-all level to compete for high scores
Compete for highest ship destroy count, fastest time or largest asteroid mass
Power-up selection after each level, many providing lasting benefits throughout the game
4 different endings depending on your performance
Many different enemy types and behaviours
Play with mouse (my favorite) or keyboard
Custom key bindings available
Control your ally asteroids in a unique’ish way

Source: [http://www.kongregate.com/games/AdamSchroeder/asteroids-reve...+- The Game Website].

185528.name: Asteroid's Revenge
185528.description:
A twist on the original asteroid’s game. You are the rock, get revenge on the ships by destroying them all!

Source: The Game Website.

185529.name: Asteroids Revenge II
185529.description:
You are an asteroid being attacked by humans. Defend yourself by avoiding their bullets and absorbing their ships. Hints & Tips are in game.
This is version 2.1
-Added mouse control
-Tweaked Speeds
-Asteroids can pass to other side of screen.
Help shape the future of the game by using your high score to vote for the next feature to add. You will receive a number of votes equal to your high score!

Source: The Game Website.

185530.name: Bubble Tanks Arenas
185530.description:
Bubble Tanks Arenas (BTA) is a spin off of the traditional Bubble Tanks series. We created it to develop and test out some powerful new features that someday will be implemented in the upcoming Bubble Tanks 3!
Rather than being able to move freely around the world, in BTA you can fight in Arenas, series of Bubblefields filled with enemies. That’s alright, but what makes it awesome is that you can create your own tanks and arenas! You can design your own avatar tanks, enemy tanks, and arenas as well as search to see what other players have created. If you’re worried about quality, don’t fret: Hero Interactive will constantly be making new Arenas for you to try out!
This game has been long in development and a massive undertaking- by far the largest game we’ve ever coded. We hope you all enjoy it!

Source: The Game Website.

185531.name: Newgrounds Rumble
185531.description:
A high-intensity brawler themed upon Newgrounds and its characters. 10 unique fighters, 11 arenas, and several modes of play.

Source: The Game Website.

185532.name: Newgrounds Museum 2
185532.description:
This game is full of history and nostalgia relating to Newgrounds. Chances are there are many inside jokes and pictures you wont understand, but you should still enjoy the game.

Source: The Game Website.

185533.name: Newgrounds Pass
185533.description:
Have fun kids!

Source: The Game Website.

185534.name: Operation Z
185534.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – AVAILABLE




This game is still either in Early-Alpha or Beta (or any status in between) but IS already available for sale / early access, so CAN BE PLAYED.




User Summary

Operation Z has you play as a gentleman soldier.

185535.name: Newgrounds Pass 2
185535.description:
Use your knowledge of Newgrounds, other popular subjects and applications to gain the passwords. There are 30 pages for 30 levels (the other 30 levels were included in Newgrounds Pass). On each page there will be a riddle, this may be a straight forward riddle or you may need to complete a task to gain the password. The riddles start off relatively easy, then as you might have guessed, they get harder towards the end.

Source: The Game Website.

185536.name: Newgrounds Museum
185536.description:
User Summary

The first Newgrounds Museum game.

185537.name: Matrix Rampage
185537.description:
Check out the sequel “Matrix Pandemonium” only on Gamebrew! Can you survive the onslaught of agents? Use guns and swords, slam through floors and walls, throw office furniture and everything else you can get a hold of to defeat as many agents as you can. They get smarter, stronger and get armed from katanas, shotguns to phazers.

Source: The Game Website.

185538.description:
STORYWORLD
The future. Slowly but steadily, the Moon has been approaching the Earth, touched the surface and ripped a deep rift across continents, mountain ranges and oceans, until it came to a halt in the now dried-out Pacific Ocean. Chaos and devastation wrecked the Earth and its inhabitants - and grew even more in dimension when the Moon revealed itself to be a "kami", a Japanese God of old: the white dragon TSUKUYUMI. Exiled into the night sky eons ago, TSUKUYUMI has been roused by Japanese warriors, who tried to rid themselves off their godly creators. TSUKUYUMI'S time for revenge has finally come...
Now, in the post-apocalyptic world, humankind is on the verge of extinction, whereas animal species mutated under the influence of TSUKUYUMI and grew bigger and stronger than ever. All those different factions are now fighting fiercely for survival, as well as for world domination.

TSUKUYUMI is a no-luck boardgame, that demands specific strategic skills of it's 3-5 (6) players. It's particular appeal lies in the clash of multifarious, asymmetrical factions. At the beginning, each player picks one of the five factions. The factions bring their own respective abilities, units and strategies. Therefore the game changes depending on what factions meet on the battlefield.

Values and abilities of the factions still don’t guarantee victory. Numerous test matches have shown: It’s the players who find new combinations and the right moments to use specific faction features, who notice their fellow players’ weaknesses and use them to their own advantages. This way, they shape their faction and bring the creatures and their stories to life.

FACTIONS
THE NOMADS are the former soldiers who were stationed on the USS Nomad, an aircraft carrier that stranded in the wastelands. Armed, agile and patriotic as they are, the NOMADS try to claim the remains of the moon in the name of their (former) nation.
THE BOARLORDS are a nation of strong and intelligent boars, who enter the pacific region from the former Korean peninsula. They aim to replace the human race as dominant species -claiming more and more land by terraforming it into their rampart-like homes.
THE CYBERSAMURAI use satellites, supercomputers and artificial intelligence once developed in old Japan to control an army of drones, fighting bots and even an orbital laser system, threatening anyone who tries to plant their flag on the moon.
THE DARK SEED'S nest grew in the wastelands as roaches and other insects became bigger and more intelligent under TSUKUYUMI'S influence. Their swarm grows rapidly - and thus they fight relentlessly to overwhelm adversarial units and territories by their sheer number.
THE KAMPFGRUPPE 03 are the heirs to the Order of Marduk - and same as their spiritual ancestors in medieval times, dragonslayers Siegfried and Georg, they strive for a world unburdened by TSUKUYUMI'S existence.

GAMEPLAY
Each faction has its own units, its own strengths and special abilities - therefore requiring a very adjusted strategy to win.
After the gameboard is set up, every player chooses a faction respectively. The faction boards explain in detail all special abilities and how to use them. It also specifies the factions' start set-up.
According to the decending initiative order marked on the board, the players install their "Homezones", pick three start-areas and place their units.
Prior to the first round, they also choose a white actioncard - a combination of actions they can use before the beginning of each round.

Then, the players gather their resources according to what their areas offer. They may use these resources to bid on the blue, green and red actioncards. Every phase is represented by six of those actioncards marked from A to F. Every card displays a different combination of the actions that can be taken during its respective phase. The highest bid is awarded with the A-card, the next one with the B-card, and so on.

Each round consists of the following phases:
White Phase: Players use the white actioncard they chose to emphasise their strategy.
Blue Phase: Players can rise in the initiative order and/or draw an Impact Card.
Green Phase: New units are generated and resources collected.
Red Phase: Units are moved, adversarial areas and units may be attacked. Onis are placed, moved, and used for attacks.

GOAL
The player who gains the most Victory Points wins the game. Victory Points are earned by conquering and occupying areas, and by fulfilling goals and/or the faction's respective mission.

END
The game ends after the number of rounds determined by the players beforehand - usually 3-4 rounds.
185538.name: TSUKUYUMI - Full Moon Down

185539.name: Matrix Pandemonium
185539.description:
Jump up and down floors of buildings, face off with evil agents, ghostly twins and vicious octo bots. Use everything you can to defeat them from swords, guns, launchers, furniture or the agents themselves!

Source: The Game Website.

185540.name: Matrix Snake
185540.description:
Snake in the Matrix!

Source: The Game Website.

185541.name: Matrix Ninja
185541.description:
Ninja Seasons will replace this game.

Source: The Game Website.

185542.name: Deflector (2007)
185542.description:
Defend your space station from the attacking alien horde.
You don’t have any weapons of your own, but what you do have is a super charged deflector array that can repel enemy missiles. Your objective is to bounce alien missiles back to the alien scum and blow them out of the sky.
Timing is the key to successfully deflecting incoming missiles – the deflector cannot protect the whole station at once and loses power quickly needing to be recharged.
Watch out for power ups, they can mean the difference between surviving a level and being wiped out!
Be prepared, this is a tough game to beat. Goodluck!

Source: The Game Website.

185543.name: Deflector (2012)
185543.description:
As you get to new rooms you will be presented with different types of challenges. and puzzles, that you will have to beat to get to the next room. These include door logic puzzles, evading enemy shoots, and deflecting your shoots off walls to hit targets.

Source: The Game Website.

185544.name: Deflectorpool
185544.description:
Use your deflecting skills to collect combos of like-colored balls while raking up a big score. Taking a risk might pay off, but can you stay in control?

Source: The Game Website.

185545.name: DeflectoBall
185545.description:
Here is a Slick 2D Physics style of Space Age Basketball Game. Can you make the perfect shot?

Source: The Game Website.

185546.name: Deflection
185546.description:
Addictive physics based game where the objective is to deflect the ball into the goal by creating deflection walls. Levels are timed, so you must have quick reflexes to win.

Source: The Game Website.

185547.name: Super Reflector
185547.description:
Reflect,refract and change colours in this exciting super awsome puzzle game.

Source: The Game Website.

185548.name: Thing Thing
185548.description:
Customize your character and see if you can fight your way out!

Source: The Game Website.

185549.name: Thing Thing 2
185549.description:
More weapons, more levels, more enemies, more Thing-Thing! Fight your way through hoardes of enemies to the boss and collect upgraded weapons along the way.

Source: The Game Website.

185550.name: Thing Thing 3
185550.description:
The 3rd installment in the Thing-Thing series now with massive new levels, new bosses, 21 new weapons, story-cutscenes, and updated character creation!
Collect weapons in story mode to do better in the survival modes and rank higher in the world-wide score boards!

Source: The Game Website.

185551.name: Thing-Thing 4
185551.description:
The Thing-Thing Saga continues!

Source: The Game Website.

185552.name: Thing-Thing Arena
185552.description:
Think you have the Thing-Thing skills to make the top 50 highscores? Survive as long as you can in 4 different modes!

Source: The Game Website.

185553.name: Thing-Thing Arena Classic
185553.description:
No goals. No time limits. Just an endless body count! Thing-Thing Arena Classic is in the format of previous Thing-Thing Arena games where survival is key. Now with more zombies and Stinky Beans!

Source: The Game Website.

185554.name: Thing Thing Arena 3
185554.description:
Shoot your way through countless enemies, but this time, do it with style!

Source: The Game Website.

185555.name: Simple Bots
185555.description:
User summary:

Simple Bots is a game of giant robot, tank, and powered armor (mecha) combat. The game can be played standalone, as a pure combat game, or it can be used to supplement the Frontier Horizons role-playing game by providing mecha/tank combat rules for characters. The rules are hex-based and combat segment based. The rules present construction methods, sample bots, and numerous scenarios with maps. The rules probably will feel more familiar to war gamers than role gamers.

185556.name: The World of Farland (3rd Edition)
185556.description:
The World of Farland: An Epic Roleplaying Setting

From the introduction:

Farland is a campaign setting for Dungeons & Dragons®, a roleplaying game. Specifically, it is a continent on a larger world called Nurion. This small continent is home to Elves, a tall and mysterious race; dwarves, a race of miners and craftsmen; humans, a flexible and prodigious race; and dark folk, creatures of shadows and evil. Farland is important, however, because it is the focus of a war for liberation. Currently much of the continent is ruled by the Seven Lords of Sin, fell creatures who rule with an iron fist on behalf of a more mysterious being, the Dweller in the icy and evil Wintervale. Farland consists of six human kingdoms and one dwarven kingdom, all of which are struggling for liberation from this oppressive evil regime. This site details the kingdoms, places, personages, and events of Farland and the wars for liberation.

185557.description: A set of alternate artwork character cards containing the 16 characters from Bang! with new and improved artwork taken from BANG! the Official Video Game.
185557.name: BANG!: Upgraded Character Cards

185558.name: FUDGE: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
185558.description:
User summary:

Of note, the game master is referred to as the "Buff Master" and is always assumed to be a female gamer.

The setting adapts the popular eponymous television show to the FUDGE game engine, providing HTML several sections including: Characters, Slayage, Research, Magic, Gloom & Doom, Self-Improvement, and Bad Guys.

Characters take on a role, either slayer, watcher, or the "Scooby Gang". Characters have six attributes, namely: Buff, Brains, Sosh, 'Tude, Magic, and Luck. Various Skills are defined, mostly aligning with the television series. Combat is detailed in the "Slayage" page and is fairly complex given the only point is to slay as rapidly and often as possible. The setting itself is well-developed and production values are surprisingly high for this type of fan-based adaptation.

185559.name: Thing-Thing Arena 2
185559.description:
Even more fast paced action with new weapon types, and new enemy hordes. Survive the onslaught of enemies for as long as you can and try to dominate the high score boards!

Source: The Game Website.

185560.name: Thing Thing Arena 4
185560.description:
The Thing-Thing saga continues!

Source: The Game Website.

185561.name: Gamma Bros
videogamehonor: 2007 IGF Awards Best Web Browser Game of the Year Nominee
185561.description:
A large neo-retro space shooter akin to classic arcade games like galaga, gradius and robotron, but with a modern twist.

Source: The Game Website.

185562.name: Jump Out! The Computer
185562.description:
Help the cute critters escape certain doom as they leap and scurry into little crevices. Save each one now!

Source: The Game Website.

185563.name: The Vault
185563.description:
What is inside the vault?
Who put it here and why?
Why there are so many layers?
Can I have some cake?
So many mysteries to be solve, let’s use our minds to solve them… Or let’s try to use as much power as we can!

Source: The Game Website.

185564.name: Loot Heroes 2
185564.description:
One dungeon. Thousands of enemies. 20 Heroes.
Unlock all of them!

Source: The Game Website.

185565.name: Where is cat?
185565.description:
Created for the #oujevipo4kids contest together with my kids: where is cat?

Source: The Game Website.

185566.name: Death Arena Reality Show
185566.description:
Fight powerful heroes and waves of minions on your tv show to entertain your viewers in this comedic bullet hell game! Upgrade your skills and learn new abilities as you go along with the program!

Source: The Game Website.

185567.name: First Empire
185567.description:
You are in command of the first empire. Your people have been traveling from universe to universe for octillions of years on a quest for truth, which makes you more powerful.
Each time, you must first create a foundation of wealth, then search the stars for neighboring centers of power. Once you’ve met your neighbors, you have to choose how you will engage them. Will you overcome them with raw military might? Will you include them in a alliance fueled by trade? Will you build a strong cultural core that makes them want to join you? The choice is yours.
As you become more powerful, you can make scientific advancements to help conquer the increasingly-difficult challenges you will meet.
Eventually, you will be in a position to start extracting truth from the universe. Once you’ve gained enough, it’s time to unfold the bonds of your current universe and start again.

Source: The Game Website.

185568.name: Monster Frontier
185568.description:
1000 years after The Apocalypse caused by a great world war between human and monster, earth lost capabilities for living. Thus now, human as the winner of the great war try to find another planet to survive. As the loser monster became enslaved by human to help them on the mission of conquering other planet.

Source: The Game Website.

185569.name: Cube Escape: The Mill
185569.description:
In the sixth installment of the Cube Escape series you find yourself in an old mill full of strange machinery. Interact with objects by using your mouse.

Source: The Game Website.

185570.name: Trinitas
185570.description:
Defend your kingdom from the hordes of orcs, knights and skeletons. Buy upgrades and unlock talents that will help you to defeat your enemies.

Source: The Game Website.

185571.name: Vortex Point 6
185571.description:
A young kid stole a cursed statue and went inside a traveling carnival. He was never seen since. It’s up to Kevin to find the stolen statue and find the missing kid, before it’s too late.

Source: The Game Website.

185572.name: Vortex Point
185572.description:
Help the team of paranormal investigators solve the case at Vortex Point and find out who or what is behind the stolen gold bars.

Source: The Game Website.

185573.name: Vortex Point 2
185573.description:
The chief of police needs the paranormal investigators team once again! Last night two teenagers were taking their photos inside a photo booth, one of them disappeared ever since…

Source: The Game Website.

185574.name: Vortex Point 3
185574.description:
Last night a man named Tom Martin has vanished from the Vortex Lake Hotel. The hotel owner believes the lake monster ate him. Is it possible though that the true monster lives on land rather than in water?

Source: The Game Website.

185575.name: Vortex Point 4
185575.description:
Join Kevin and the gang and help them solve the mystery behind the crimes at the Vortex Point artists square!

Source: The Game Website.

185576.name: Vortex Point 5
185576.description:
Everybody’s out of town, so no mystery cases to solve tonight. Time for Kevin to enjoy a relaxing evening watching a classic horror movie. But wait a minute, what’s that thing lurking in the dark?

Source: The Game Website.

185577.name: RCM
185577.description:
Race for fame, hire technicians, find sponsors and form teams to buy all the cars in this idle clicker.
Note: the game stores the progress in the browser. you can export your state from the options menu.

Source: The Game Website.

185578.name: Serious Dave
185578.description:
Action adventure with a lot of shooting, platform jumping and a strong retro atmosphere, inspired by old console games.

Source: The Game Website.

185579.name: Excavate!
185579.description:
The University wants you to go to the town of Nowe Monasterzysko and lead the excavations in the area of an old cemetery. You’ll have a 14 days permit so make a good use of that time – locate as many ruins and catalogue as many finds as possible.
Inspect, dig, excavate! Find hidden ruins, clear and identify your finds, buy upgrades and manage your excavations!

Source: The Game Website.

185580.name: Jack MacQwerty
185580.description:
Jack Macqwerty’s name is no mistake or accident, as this shooting game is about firing this cowboy’s gun by typing words in the keyboard.

Source: The Game Website.

185581.name: Bloodline Legacy
185581.description:
Start your legacy, develop your skills, go on some adventures… then pass your wealth and knowledge on to your descendants!

Bloodline Legacy is an idle/incremental game about completing quests, earning experience, and being better than your grandpa.

Source: The Game Website.

185582.description: A promo monster given away at the game's release ; just shuffle it with the other Grimoire cards and draw 5 random Monsters at the beginning of the game, as usual.
185582.name: The Big Book of Madness: Golem promo

185583.name: Eidolon: City in the Sky, Second Edition
185583.description:
From publisher blurb:

The palace-city of Eidolon floats in the sky above the northern coast of the great continent of Emer. This city is a place of magic and wealth: a beautiful marble, crystal and glass metropolis which is the capital of the powerful economic city-state of Sel-kai. It is also the haven and hub to legendary skyships: vessels which sail the winds.

But there are new dangers to Eidolon and her sister city of Sel-kai below: nearby nations threaten war, and mysterious powers have arisen, coveting the wealth and power of Eidolon.

Eidolon Contains:

Detailed color city maps of Eidolon and Sel-kai.
Descriptions of more than 250 individual businesses in Sel-kai and Eidolon, many with layouts.
Price lists for items, services, lodging, and transport.
Updated extensive index.




Second Edition Adds:

A complete layout revision with new material added throughout the book. 100 more pages in all!
A timeline advanced several years, including crucial new events.
Many new Adventures, set in Sel-kai & Eidolon.
New skyship and watercraft info, including ship plans.
New details about the inner workings of Eidolon and Sel-kai: society, celebrities, and scandals!
NPC stats for RM2/Classic and RMSS/RMFRP.

185586.name: Loot Heroes
185586.description:
Make your way though the dungeons of hell and get tons of loot!
(and do it all over again to gain even more loot).

Source: The Game Website.

boardgamehonor: 2016 Golden Geek Best Board Game Artwork & Presentation Nominee
185589.description:
Set sail in a mystical archipelago filled with bustling towns, sea monsters, pirates, and gold! Compete to build the best sea-faring nation with up to three friends by collecting treasure, hiring crew, and conquering or befriending island towns.

In Islebound, you take command of a ship and crew. You sail to island towns, collecting resources, hiring crew, and commissioning buildings for your capital city. Each building has a unique ability, and your combination of buildings can greatly enhance your strength as a trader, builder, or invader. You also recruit pirates and sea monsters to conquer towns, which, once conquered, allow you to complete the town action for free, and charge a fee to opponents if they want to use it. Alternatively, you can complete events that give influence, which can be used to befriend towns.

There are many routes to success. Will you be a ruthless conqueror, careful diplomat, or shrewd merchant in your race to the top?

The player with the most wealth and most-impressive capital city will win the game!
185589.name: Islebound
boardgamepodcastepisode: #24: The HYPE Episode! Gen Con 2016 Preview; Rocky Road a la Mode preview; Among the Stars on tap
#29: Islebound review, Tavarua on tap, The Beer Primer: IPAs
#36: 2016, A Year in Review
Cult of the New Board Game Podcast 005 – 7 Wonders vs Nevermore
Episode 121: Mythos Tales, Far Space Foundry and Horror Films turned Board Game
Episode 1: T.I.M.E Stories and Literally the Worst Games
Episode 39 :: Islebound Review + Questions with Cat and the Hat
Episode 40 - Interview with Red Raven Games Ryan Laukat
Episode 59 - Hit Z Road
Islebound Review
The Dice Men Cometh – Episode 155
The Long View - Quick Looks #22
Vox Republica 136: Creating A Gaming Cafe
What Did You Play This Week Podcast Thing Week 47!!! ft Chris and Joe from Cardboard Architect
What Did You Play This Week Podcast Thing Week 99

185590.name: The Lonely Lyrakien
185590.description:
From publisher blurb:

Build amazing relationships between your heroes and NPCs!

The Lonely Lyrakien is a charming sprite, a heavenly emissary of Lady Luck, and a companion to heroes. With her former master long lost, she seeks new adventure in the company of those with the courage to overthrow tyranny without and to follow their lucky stars on a journey to discover new lands and new adventures even as they discover the truth hidden in their own hearts.

Ultimate Relationships contains a system for relationships that provides a meaningful progression and story for the significant NPCs your PCs might encounter in the course of a campaign, including secrets to uncover as the relationship progresses, and hurdles for the PC and the NPC to overcome together. Unlike other relationship systems that bottleneck on certain skills, often Diplomacy, Ultimate Relationships allows everyone to progress and reveal the NPC’s story at their own rate; it just might take some characters longer than others.
NPC relationships in that Adventure Path as well as others.

185591.name: The Viking Shieldmaiden
185591.description:
From publisher blurb:

Build amazing relationships between your heroes and NPCs!

The Viking Shieldmaiden is a proud viking warrior who must come to grips with the taste of dishonor and failure. With the PCs’ help, she might come out the other side stronger than ever. The Viking Shieldmaiden is extremely competitive, reacts aggressively when she feels she is being disrespected, and often becomes confused when the ins and outs of viking honor aren’t as obvious to others as they are to her. However, she is fiercely loyal to her true friends and comrades, and she is never bitter about losing a competition fairly, merely excited to improve and try again.

Ultimate Relationships contains a system for relationships that provides a meaningful progression and story for the significant NPCs your PCs might encounter in the course of a campaign, including secrets to uncover as the relationship progresses, and hurdles for the PC and the NPC to overcome together. Unlike other relationship systems that bottleneck on certain skills, often Diplomacy, Ultimate Relationships allows everyone to progress and reveal the NPC’s story at their own rate; it just might take some characters longer than others.

This product contains a set of core relationship rules for making these kinds of interactions between PCs and NPCs a rich and vibrant part of your campaign. They are suitable for use in any campaign, but for groups playing in the official published Adventure Paths we will also be releasing a series of modules featuring the core NPCs from those Adventure Paths, as well as new NPCs introduced in the respective Adventure Path Plug-Ins from Legendary Games.

185592.name: Judge Fool
185592.description:
From publisher blurb:

Judge Fool is a superhero adventure for the award-winning Savage Worlds roleplaying game, set on a colossal scale. It's a time-hopping cosmic Odyssey in the spirit of Jim Starlin and Grant Morrison, with maybe a little Moebius thrown in. Adam Warlock meets Doctor Who meets the Incal Light? Something like that.

The Lords of Dust and Silence are eating the future, chunk by bloody chunk. Judge Fool has come from the One-Hundred-and-First Century on a desperate mission, looking for champions who might help him defeat them before they gobble up the universe in a frenzy of cosmic crapulence.

Literally before. The Lords move backward in time, touching our universe every two thousand years, growing more and more powerful each time they bite off another section of reality.

Judge Fool failed to stop them in the Eighty-First Century and the champions he found there all died (or worse.) If he can fight them in the Sixty-First they might not be too powerful yet to defeat for once and for all, if he can find the right heroes. The Forty-First Century was no good, so he has come to the Twenty-First, looking for help. Can the PCs help him save tomorrow?

This giant-sized, 143 page adventure gives you:

Fourteen different battle maps, including the ultra-secret military base known as Camp Nowhere and the unspeakable Vaults of Znorph
Notes on four different future epochs, as well as the Lost Hyperboean Age of the distant past, when Grud the Barbarian walked the earth
Dozens of NPCs, including three supervillain teams of the far future, countless horrors from beyond time and space, an arch-villain from the 1960s, the terrible Knights of Nothing, a megalodon shark, all the mightiest heroes and villains of the Hyperborean Age (yes, Grud the Barbarian is one of them) and the universe's last and greatest heavy metal band.
Fifteen different fight scenes, with detailed notes on running each battle
Tons of extra options for the GM, including four seperate plot paths the PCs can take to the final battle at the end of time.
Our solemn word that your PCs will have the oportunity to punch a dinosaur in the face. Seriously, we promise.

185593.name: Bedlam in Bedlam
185593.description:
From publisher blurb:

Things were bad enough in the decaying city of Bedlam before the psychopathic supervillain called the Cold Killer showed up. Now the authorities are up to their necks in frozen corpses in the middle of a blazing hot summer and the city is on the brink of panic. But when Our Heroes try to stop the Cold Killer's rampage, they get sucked into far deeper and more terrible matters. Because in a place like Beldam, the truth is always so much worse than you think.

This giant-sized, 199 page adventure is crammed with enough double-crosses, intrigue and secret skullduggery to satisfy any Bedlam City fan. Includes more than a dozen full-color maps, more than fifty NPCs, and an in-depth breakdown of an entire secret base, covering seven floors and over 130 separate rooms in lavish detail. Also includes fiendish experiments, nefarious conspiracies, sinister government agents, awful revelations, lurking shadows, stubble-jawed heroes brooding on rooftops at midnight, everything a Bedlam City adventure needs!

185594.name: 13 Shades of Darkness (Savage Worlds)
185594.description:
From publisher blurb:

Like most people, you've probably asked yourself "How can I get my hands on more nightmarish supernatural evil?" Well look no further! Thirteen Shades of Darkness contains Savage Worlds stats and background information for thirteen occult supervillains, ranging in power from minor annoyances to dark and malignant gods.

Each of our thirteen villains offers a slightly different take on the genre; a shade of darkness all its own. They range in tone from lighthearted to unspeakable (and a few of them are both). Some are traditional supervillains whose powers derive from the occult--thieves, killers and murderous megalomaniacs who use the dark arts to pursue traditional supervillain goals, while some are much worse things.

Each comes with at least two adventure scenarios, for thirty adventures in total. All the blood-curdling horror you could possibly want, and perhaps just a little bit more!

185595.name: Comic Book Adventures: Mission Book 4
185595.description:
From publisher blurb:

This fourth in a series of mission usable with Comic Book Adventures, these mid level mission and adventure are feared towards 4th to 6th level heroes and meant to continue your fun solo games. The mission book is packed full of new missions and adventures and builds on the story and plot lines begun in the Mini-Mission and the other mission books.

185596.name: Control
185596.description:
From publisher blurb:

Some person or organization or conglomerate – exactly what is unknown – has targeted one of the Vigilantes, and has systematically been destroying that Vigilante's life. It started small, with an assault upon the Vigilante's credit and records, but quickly accelerated into forcing them out of their job, and then out of the Ultrapolis altogether. And as the team's investigation into these events deepens, they begin to realize just how many people have suffered this same fate...

185597.description:
ASL Compatible expansion from Lone Canuck Publishing covers the actions of September 22nd and 23rd around the Dutch town of Mariaheide.

Product includes pre-cut double-sided counters, map, historical background, scenarios, and mini campaign game.
185597.name: Hell's Highway: Mariaheide, Holland 22-23 September 1944

185598.name: Zuriel Broadleaf
185598.description:
From publisher blurb:

Oops! That six-hour marathon game session started 15 minutes ago, and you have already killed a player character (PC)! He was decapitated while being consumed in dragon fire, and his corpse fell into a sphere of annihilation. Your prediction for recovery is “not likely.” You built pre-generated characters for this campaign six months and four character levels ago! You don’t want your player to sit and read the newspaper for the next 5.75 hours. You need a comparable-level character sheet quickly.

OR… A new player has just shown up to your table willing to learn to sling dice. You found out he or she was coming thirty minutes before game time. Your regular crew of miscreants has already killed off all the spare pre-generated characters you rolled up with gleeful abandon, while cackling wildly and uttering something about “drive ‘em like you stole ‘em.” You want this first gaming experience to be fun and memorable, so you don’t want to completely wing it. You need a character sheet, right now.

Welcome to Instant Character! Just add a player, and go! In this product, you will discover twenty complete stat blocks for a single PC, level 1 through 20, adhering to the Pathfinder® Roleplaying Game rules. The core format adheres to the standard non-player character (NPC) stat block most GMs are already familiar with minus the Tactics section. This makes it easier for the GM to assist with finding information and also prepares the player for the day he or she is running games! The Special Abilities section includes more detailed write-ups of feats and character abilities than a standard NPC stat block to facilitate faster play. Sources for spells, races, classes, archetypes, and prestige classes from sources other than the Pathfinder® Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook™ (PZO1110) are listed in the Sources section and can be referenced in the Pathfinder® Roleplaying Game Reference Document.

At the end of this document is a sheet of character and spell tokens including a token for this character and assorted Non-Player Characters (NPCs) and spell effects. For best results, print the token page and laminate the entire sheet. Initially cut out into squares. To improve ability to move and pick up the laminated tokens, trim off the gray corners to make an octagonal shape.

Snapshot Statement

Zuriel is a neutral good male elf with druid levels using the treesinger archetype who fills the roles of healer, combat caster, and ranged combatant.

185599.name: World Idle
185599.description:
Manage a breeding population, give people food and other resources to keep them happy, as unhappy population will just die – nobody wants to see that, do we?
If you like the game, comment and share ideas. I really want to hear what you have to say. Have been working on this game for a long time now.

Source: The Game Website.

185600.name: Star Runner: Genesis
185600.description:
As captain, choose your ship and the way you will live the adventure of StarRunner.

Trade, explore and fight to upgrade your ship and be prepared: opposing forces are ready to start a war.

Sooner or later, people will expect you to choose a side…

Developer Notes:

- If you have any weird issue (quest you can’t finish even if you have the good item or a “desynchronisation” message (you would lose your progress), just refresh the page.

Source: The Game Website.

185601.name: No Credit, No Problem!
185601.description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 33 – “You are the Monster”
It’s your first day on the job as a Title Loan Agent. You must get past the probationary period which involves successfully accepting or denying 10 applications.
Gameplay is inspired by games like Papers, Please.
Enjoy!

Source: The Game Website.

185602.name: Undertale

2015 Golden Geek Best Indie Video Game Nominee

2016 Game Developers Choice Awards Best New IP of the Year Nominee

2016 SXSW Best Gameplay of the Year Nominee
2016 SXSW Best Innovation of the Year Winner
2016 SXSW Best New IP of the Year Nominee
2016 SXSW Game of the Year Nominee
185602.description:
User Summary

A part-RPG part bullet-hell-lite adventure that focuses strongly on alternatives to killing your enemies, while still allowing you to do so. It follows a lost child through the underground where the monsters live, and those monsters may in fact be seeking the powerful human soul of just such a child.

185604.name: Trivia San Diego
185604.description:
Trivia San Diego is a clone of Monopoly set in the city of San Diego, California. The game board locations are businesses and attractions from the city.

From the Publisher: Trivia San Diego is designed to bring hours of exciting challenges for all participants while teaching them interesting facts about their community. This game is for 4-16 players (2 to 4 teams of 2 to 4).

185606.name: The New Idle Blacksmith
185606.description:
Start your journey as an apprentice blacksmith and become the most famous blacksmith in the world.
Game features :
- Mine ores.
- Smelt them into metal bars.
- Forge equipment.
- Enchant your equipment, select a price and sell them.
- Hire workers and upgrade them.
- Achieve difficult tasks.
- Ascend for powerful bonus.
This game is a serious effort to enhance the experience of the original Idle Blacksmith.

Source: The Game Website.

185607.name: Popcorn Chef
185607.description:
As you pour popcorn kernels into the cooking pot, you wonder how many are needed to fill it completely without causing a spillover, but it is really hard to get it just right, and sometimes you add too much or too little. Popcorn Chef is here to help you solve this very problem, and turn you into a popcorn cooking master, able to fill any weird shaped pot right up to the rim with surgical precision.

Source: The Game Website.

185608.name: The Habs
185608.description:
Test your knowledge on 100 players, coaches and builders from the most prestgious team in hockey history.

Learn more on these illustrious characters who gave made this team the envy of all sports organizations on the planet.

3 clues on the card. 3 points for a correct answer on the first clue, 2 on the second and 1 on the third. 0 for an incorrect answer. After 3 periods the player with the most points wins the game.

185609.name: The Hunt for the Red Cthulhu
185609.description:
You’re set off in the single explorer sub. Deep many league under the sea. To find this anomoly creature call the Red Cthulhu. In this vast Greeny Gameboy oceanverse.

Source: The Game Website.

185610.name: Gunball Reloaded
185610.description:
Gunballs are back! This time there are even more weapons, skills and enemies.

Sweep over on the map, become a punishing sword for all foes, fight the bosses, complete quests and buy new weapons to challenge demon from the pits of hell.

Source: The Game Website.

185611.name: Jump Out! The Box
185611.description:
Help the cute critters escape certain doom as they leap and scurry into little crevices. Save each one now!

Source: The Game Website.

185612.name: Idle Vikings RPG
185612.description:
Idle Viking RPG offers a unique twist to idle gaming, adding you, the hero, to the game and delivering an RPG narrative in bite-size chunks!

Welcome to the world of Midgard, a place full of fierce Vikings, mighty gods, bizarre beasties and a healthy dose of axes!

With Idle Viking RPG, create your own hero; decide what type of a ruler you’re going to be; and get ready to lead your fellow Vikings to glory.

Your settlements will continue gather resources even while you are not there (offline), so make sure you come back to check on their progress and upgrade!

Build up your 3 settlements across ancient Britain and earn blessings through prestiging. Each settlement is constructed in honour of one of 3 mighty Viking gods – Odin, Loki and Thor.

Collect gazillions of resources; build and improve the settlement; train your hero; and be decisive when faced with difficult dilemmas.

Source: The Game Website.

185613.name: Bro Team
185613.description:
Do you like strategy, tactics and puzzles?
Then play Bro team!
Use the strength of Brutus, The stealth of Ryu and the accuracy of Ocelot to reach the top of the island!

Source: The Game Website.

185614.name: Ayo the Hero
185614.description:
Help Ayo recover a magical sphere which contains the source of life!

Source: The Game Website.

185615.name: Cube Escape: Case 23
185615.description:
Help Dale Vandermeer’s investigation on the death of a woman in the 5th episode of Cube Escape. Gather evidence and find a way to Rusty Lake.

Source: The Game Website.

185616.name: Tainted Olive - Chapter 2
185616.description:
Tainted Olive can best be described as a blend of comics, fantasy novels and good old-fashioned puzzle solving. It is an ongoing story through a dark fantasy world that gets more fleshed out with each chapter.
After Silvian manages to leave Parentium, he heads to Dua Castros in order to find out what happened for the shipments of olives and metal to stop. But before he can get to the city, he must traverse Kontiya – or as known among townsfolk, the Woods of Unrest.
Chapter Two is a fast-paced escape through the forest and the mountain, which nevertheless manages to introduce more of the world and expand the backstory of both Silvian and the characters around him.
Happy playing!

Source: The Game Website.

185617.name: Bouncy And Monsto
185617.description:
Reunite Monsto with his best friend Bouncy who got stuck while collecting stars.
Bouncy and Monsto are two best friends who love to chase after stars and eat them for dinner.
Help them in their adventure of collecting stars which unfortunately got little Bouncy stuck!

Source: The Game Website.

185618.name: Globe Master 3D
185618.description:
Find places on the 3D Globe: cities, interesting places, UNESCO World Heritage sites, mountains and football stadiums.

Source: The Game Website.

185619.name: Donutosaur 2
185619.description:
Help Donutosaur get his donut! Collect candies by changing the shape of Donutosaur and switching the direction of gravity. Donutosaur’s friends will be of great help – they can push, pull and destroy objects.

Source: The Game Website.

185620.name: Guess Countries: Africa
185620.description:
Need to learn Africa countries for school? For fun? You’re at the good place!
- 54 countries to find with the help of a blank map
- Adjustable timer (none, 2’, 4’, 6’, 8’, 10’)
- Two validation modes : automatic or manual

[ver. 1.1]

Source: The Game Website.

185621.name: Rumble in the Soup
185621.description:
Ruthless rumble with the hurricane action for an authority in the soup!
Shooter-action game with lots of upgrades, enemies and explosions.

Source: The Game Website.

185622.name: RECON
185622.description:
Recon is a technical, advanced small team tactics experience that, faithful to the mud and blood series, won’t take you by the hand.
Lead and administrate a team of elite Rangers during the Vietnam War as they hunt humans across the Laos border. It’ll be unfair at times, mostly brutal and definitely random.
This game has been built over the last year with the help of the Mud and Blood community with great attention to historical and technical ‘realism’ giving RECON a hardcore military sim flavor.

Source: The Game Website.

185623.name: Don't Escape 3
185623.description:
I woke up with a terrible headache, like if someone hit my head really hard. I had no idea what I didn’t like more: the fact that I woke up in the ship’s airlock or the fact that the computer was counting down to something…

Don’t Escape 3 is another installment of anti-escape games by scriptwelder. This time you find yourself on a starship drifting in space. The rest of the crew is probably dead, however you don’t seem to be alone

Source: The Game Website.

185624.name: Wayfarer: Things Beyond Wonder
185624.description:
From the introduction:

Wayfarer is a tabletop role playing game in which intrepid explorers adventure between realities. Narratives span multiple genres, from high-concept science fiction, to sword and sorcery epics, and everything in between.

User summary:

The core resolution mechanic of the game uses d10 with modifier, compared to a Difficulty Value set by the GM. Success or failure degrees are based on the difference between the modified roll and the Difficulty Value.

Characters have several Attributes, namely: Strength, Dexterity, Bulk, Agility, Endurance, Reason, Perception, Willpower, Creativity, and Charisma. Characters also have several Functional Attributes, namely: Power, Fortitude, Coordination, Action, Speed, Mass, and Aptitude. Characters have Traits, Skills, and may know Tricks. Character creation follows an established formula--Species, Occupation, Attributes, Personality, Skills, Bonus Experience, and Equipping.

185625.name: Zirkus Leo
185625.description: In Zirkus Leo, brings Leo the Lion and his friends into the ring where players will experience many turbulent events.

185626.name: Crusaders of the Lost Idols
videogamehonor: 2015 CVA Best Social/Casual Game of the Year Nominee
185626.description:
Hail Crusader! Lead your team on a quest for glory and idols! Find the best position for The Bush Whacker and click your heart out! Or maximize your formation buffs to idle and earn the most gold!

Source: The Game Website.

185627.name: Finite Moves
185627.description:
Once again, it is time to put your brain to the test!
Spend every move to shift tiles to the designated spots over 50 intricate levels with flashy effects and soft relaxing music.
Discover the game’s secrets for additional challenge!

Source: The Game Website.

185628.name: Tough Love Machine
185628.description:
Wiggle arms, touch hearts

Source: The Game Website.

185629.name: Helixteus II
185629.description:
Break the confines of your home planet and explore the fringes of space, colonizing every planet you see while battling against the mighty Helixteii enemies whose presence is seen throughout the entire multiverse.
Build buildings to expand your empire, send customizable ships to fight the enemies, mine to collect crafting materials to craft awesome items, and take on the boss that stole planet Earth and save the day.
An idle game “taken to a new supercluster”!

Source: The Game Website.

185630.name: Logical Element
185630.description:
Logical puzzle about circuits.

Source: The Game Website.

185631.name: Micrics
185631.description:
In our world there are many different viruses, and your task is to deal with the bad ones. Use multi-colored blocks and crush red microorganisms! Black blocks you can not move. Be sure that you can cope with it, you must just try. Good luck!

Source: The Game Website.

185632.name: BLOCnog
185632.description:
BLOCnog is not the usual sliding puzzle game.

Slide your block through mazes, connect or destroy other blocks in order to get the right shape and to the exit marks.

Source: The Game Website.

185633.name: The Last Time - Prologue
185633.description:
Welcome to the demo for The Last Time! The game features the narrative depth and emotional impact of a modern adventure game by the likes of Telltale and Quantic Dream, delivered with the graphical style and game mechanics of a classic point-and-click.

Source: The Game Website.

185634.name: War Heroes
185634.description:
Manage your troops to kick out incoming enemies. For this operation build weapon emplacements at strategic locations. We will support artillery, special forces and skillful sappers under your command.

Source: The Game Website.

185635.name: 50 years (graphical)
185635.description:
50 years is a coffebreak turn-based strategy.

I started to make this game after have played in Civilization and other “big” turn-based strategies a lot. They a perfect games, but sometimes they are too long. So I want to make a short TBS, but with all this things like nation choosing at the start and town management.

Source: The Game Website.

185636.name: Space Flash Arena 2
185636.description:
Space combat simulation.
Fight, earn money, upgrade your ship with a kick-**s equipment and nuclear warheads!

Source: The Game Website.

185637.name: The Platform
185637.description:
Use your skill and reflexes to dodge obstacles and remain on the Platform as long as you can. Run, jump, duck and use Slow Motion to avoid hazards.

Collects coins to buy upgrades that will allow you to stay on the platform longer. You may take two upgrades into each game, try different combinations to find your favorite!

Play a friend or a computer in ‘Versus Mode’. Either compete for a better score or simply try to out live your opponent. In ‘Versus Mode’ collect coins to replenish your timebar.

Source: The Game Website.

185638.name: Indefinite: Interrogation Game
185638.description:
Answer uncomfortable questions in this endless interrogation.
In a dystopian future, a mysterious catastrophe has devastated the world. Now the government is rounding up suspects, and you’re one of them.
You have a few seconds to answer each question. If you don’t answer in time, you’re guilty. If you contradict yourself, you’re guilty. Good luck.

Source: The Game Website.

185639.name: Zombie Riot
185639.description:
Survive from the zombie riot!
Gather survivors by saving them from buildings full of zombies!
Put your survivors strategically to defend against the zombies’ attacks.
Use sniper blast skill to blow the zombies’ heads, push them back with Mega boomerang,
or freeze them in place with frozen air.
Upgrade the survivors’ to make them even stronger.
Discover Zombie Riot’s thrilling adventure by Goody Gameworks.

Source: The Game Website.

185640.name: You're Grounded
185640.description:
A graphic adventure with turtles, quantustatic motors, explosions, keys, chests, time machines, authoritarian mothers, world domination, parallel universes, light beams, paradoxes and bugs… many bugs.

Source: The Game Website.

185641.name: Hero Simulator
185641.description:
An idle-rpg game about little guy Folcard who tries to continue his ancestors craft of being a hero.

Source: The Game Website.

185642.name: Idle Online Universe
185642.description:
Kill monsters alone or with friends, upgrade your abilities, grow your pets, build your guild and more in this Idle MMORPG.
Note :: Everything is saved ON THE SERVERS, and you can play with other players. The purpose of the creation of this game was to let players feel safe about their accounts, and get to add multi-user interaction.

Source: The Game Website.

185643.name: Mine Upgrade
185643.description:
mine your way through powerful minerals and idle your way to the top

Source: The Game Website.

185644.name: Guess Countries: Asia
185644.description:
Need to learn Asia countries for school? For fun? You’re at the good place!

- 49 countries to find with the help of a blank map
- Adjustable timer (none, 2’, 4’, 6’, 8’, 10’)
- Two validation modes : automatic or manual

[ver. 1.3]

Source: The Game Website.

185645.name: Trimps
185645.description:
Gather resources, trap creatures, fight with your creatures, earn random maps, customize your maps, find unique maps with powerful rewards, purchase weapons and armor, prestige your weapons and armor, find over 60 unique things from battling, earn perks, earn bonuses, complete challenges, discover the story as you progress, and have oodles of fun.

Source: The Game Website.

185646.name: Infinite Spreadsheets
185646.description:
Run a company, hire interns, gain influence and other cools stuff in this Idle/Incremental game!
The game is still being developed so any suggestions how to improve are welcome!

Source: The Game Website.

185647.name: The Money Makers
185647.description:
Welcome to CASHVILLE! Start with simple jobs, gaining experience and knowledge to advance. While idling, increase your funds over time by making investments and taking advantage of the stock exchange. Build your own office with staff made of real players to maximize work profits. Finally, compete with your friends, buying sports cars, houses, yachts or even a private jets! But remember – limited energy and lifetime (like in real life) makes that only a few can became a millionaires!
Are you one of them?

Source: The Game Website.

185648.name: A Tale of Caos: Prologue
185648.description:
An old style, pixel-art game, inspired by classical point-and-click games.
A steam-fantasy adventure, running in a maze of magic, wonders, strange technologies and pure nonsense!
Help Terry, a smart but distract technomancer, to solve her quest!
IMPORTANT NOTE: Caos is not a misspelling. It’s not ‘chaos’. It’s Caos. It’s important.

Source: The Game Website.

185649.name: Disaster Will Strike 5
185649.description:
Crush a slew of evil eggs to keep the prehistoric beasts from returning! In Disaster Will Strike 5, you control the roughest elements of nature. Call upon floods, earthquakes, meteors, and hurricanes to smash the eggs. Save Good Eggs!

Source: The Game Website.

185650.name: Realm of Empires: Warlords Rising
185650.description:
Guide your fledgling dominion from its beginnings as a single, small village to a massive sprawling empire. Order your peasants to construct new buildings. Grow your village into a town. Research innovations, and recruit the troops you need to defend yourself – or to go on the attack.
Surrounding your lands are other players seeking to do the same. You can befriend them, form alliances and clans, and work together to strengthen your hold on a hostile landscape. Or you can crush the fools for being in your way – by word or by sword, the realm is yours to conquer!

Source: The Game Website.

185651.name: Red Oz Episode 1
185651.description:
I’ve been away for a while, but I want to try to reconnect with my players again. I MISS you guys! I don’t have as much time as I used to, but I still want to make games and keep in touch! Please shoot me a message if you want to say hi! :D

This is my take on the classic Wizard of Oz tale. I take a lot of liberties but I also try to reference some of the lesser known parts of the original books. I’m going to try to avoid touching the movies, and stick with the source content as inspiration, also the setting will fully tie into my other games! Please follow my on youtube for some other behind the scenes facts and videos about my titles!

Source: The Game Website.

185652.name: Videograte
185652.description:
Watch videos from YouTube as you chat.

This is a work in progress, make your requests in the comments section and I’ll implement the most popular ones.

Source: The Game Website.

185653.name: Shop Heroes
185653.description:
Brand new simulation management game. Customize your shop, train your workers & craft epic items!

Source: The Game Website.

185654.name: Guess Countries: South America
185654.description:
Need to learn South America countries for school? For fun? You’re at the good place!

- 13 countries to find with the help of a blank map
- Adjustable timer (none, 2’, 4’, 6’, 8’, 10’)
- Two validation modes : automatic or manual

[ver. 1.2]

Source: The Game Website.

185655.name: ARMY FORCE FIRESTORM: 3D Multiplayer FPS
185655.description:
ARMY FORCE FIRESTORM is a 3D Multiplayer First Person Shooter. Choose between many wepaons and battle your friends on several maps!

Source: The Game Website.

185656.name: Idle Business
185656.description:
Earn a lot of money with different business.

Source: The Game Website.

185657.name: Prophet
185657.description:
In this game you have many adventures and obstacles! Be ready to run, jump, slip and fall! Try to collect all stars of the level, and find the door to the next stage. Be careful and cautious. You will succeed!

Source: The Game Website.

185658.name: Okame
185658.description:
Relax and harmonize your soul and mind during playing this puzzle game. Full verision with exclusive levels:

Source: The Game Website.

185659.name: Global Strike
185659.description:
The first non-plugin 3D FPS browser game.

Source: The Game Website.

185660.name: Guess Countries: USA
185660.description:
Need to learn the U.S. States for school? For fun? You’re at the good place!

- 50 states to find with the help of a blank map
- Adjustable timer (none, 2’, 4’, 6’, 8’, 10’)
- Two validation modes : automatic or manual

[ver. 1.1]

Source: The Game Website.

185661.name: Nightflies 2
185661.description:
Use lady beetles to fly objects off the play-field so that nightflies can reach the lanterns in this cool physics-based puzzle

Source: The Game Website.

185662.name: Cube Escape: Harvey's Box
185662.description:
Harvey needs to escape his box before he arrives at Rusty Lake. Discover the purpose of the items with him: an egg, a comb, a box of cigars…
Things are not what they seem to be in this 4th episode of the Cube Escape series.

Source: The Game Website.

185663.name: SAGA Idle
185663.description:
SAGA Idle v0.98 beta
Build buildings, hire heroes, kill monsters and collect mana shards to increase your earning power!

Source: The Game Website.

185664.name: Blocks 2
185664.description:
“Blocks 2” is a logic puzzle game with 60 levels to twist your brain. Move the blocks in one line to make them disappear until any block is left on the level. This game is a real challenge for your mind!

Source: The Game Website.

185665.name: Marrakesh Club
185665.description:
Every tourist who comes to Morocco knows that he must visit Marrakesh Club, the only problem is how to get inside. Help Joseph pass the Moroccan tea test.

Source: The Game Website.

185666.name: Nambers
185666.description:
It’s simple to pick-up and learn, but it will give your brain a workout as you advance to the more difficult levels.
Select adjacent cells with the same number and scroll them left and right to change their values. Complete levels by creating the target pattern. Finish in as few moves as possible to get all of the stars.
In the game you will find over 50 levels.
No moves limit, no time limit! Play this perfect flash game and have fun!

Source: The Game Website.

185667.name: Wheely 5: Armageddon
185667.description:
Wheely decided to cut some grass near his house …

Source: The Game Website.

185668.name: Project GunGame
185668.description:
Create to Play Friends Server!!!!

Source: The Game Website.

185669.name: Strikeforce Kitty: Last Stand
185669.description:
While our heroes from Strikeforce Kitty 2 were leading the invasion against King Fox, he ambushed us! An army is striking right at the heart of our kittens’ kingdom: Great Kittycastle. Tired and beaten, the evil fox army has hired powerful raccoon mercenaries to bolster their ranks!

Repel waves of enemies and lead the defense of Great Kittycastle in this new idle-game about brave kittens.

Source: The Game Website.

185670.name: Sieger: Rebuilt to Destroy
185670.description:
Play 32 of the most notable sieges of the past 2500 years in this fairly simple physics puzzle-strategy game.

Kill all castle defenders and save the hostages by carefully choosing what supporting blocks of the castle to smash.

You can earn one of the three medals (Clear, Decisive and Brilliant Victory) and loot the castles by hitting the treasure chests and the artefacts.

The fewer shots the better.

Source: The Game Website.

185671.name: Sancho Ponchek
185671.description:
Sancho Ponchek is a mix of idle and rpg games. You can just watch Sanchos XP growing, or actively fight monsters. In your quest you can bake new yourself to enlarge damage, or find magic rings The score is to go as deep as possible.

Source: The Game Website.

185672.name: Guess Countries: Europe
185672.description:
Need to learn the countries of Europe for school? For fun? You’re at the good place!

- 45 countries to find with the help of a blank map
- Adjustable timer (none, 2’, 4’, 6’, 8’, 10’)
- Two validation modes : automatic or manual

[ver. 1.5]

Source: The Game Website.

185673.name: Gnome Go Home
185673.description:
★★★

★ New pack of 18 levels !
★ Added a new soundtrack
★ Various bug fixes and improvements

★★★

Tired gnomes were going home but suddenly the Witch had confused their well-known way. Help the heroes get back to their families!

“Gnome go home” is a small world the gnomes live in. They work hard all night in the shafts mining rocks. But the noise from their work interferes the Witch with concentrating on the hexing. She has confused the Gnomes’ ways home, so each time less of them come back and finally no-one will get home. Every morning tired Gnomes have to wander home through the forest full of danger awaiting them. Help the Gnomes reach their warm and cozy home quicker and safer!

★ Sweet and unique graphics

★ Nice and fun atmosphere

★ Easy and fancy learning with simple tutorial

★★★

Have a fun!

Source: The Game Website.

185674.name: Game.Init
185674.description:
You have created something and it has been suffering for too long. Try to find the solution in this unique platformer. An atmospheric platformer game that features a double jumping mechanic via light. A meta story about a programmer and his creation that pulls you in with surprising 2 endings. How to Play:
W,A,S,D keys to move, Mouse to interact

Source: The Game Website.

185675.name: Just Can't Wait to Escape
185675.description:
Escape the alien waiting room!

A 5-minute point-and-click game.

Source: The Game Website.

185676.name: Cube Escape: Arles
185676.description:
Enter a small apartment of a famous painter in Arles in October of 1888. Surrounded by art, you must try to escape the room.

Source: The Game Website.

185677.name: Trollface Quest 13
185677.description:
Do you question games with happy endings? Do you think there’s nothing more hilarious than a stupid accident or a prank gone wrong? Good. Because this is an adventure in top-notch trolling. Lovers of free escape games with lots of levels will revel in this twisted take on the genre, where you lure a series of dastardly and deserving characters to unfortunate fates…creating laughs for everyone else.

Source: The Game Website.

185678.name: Error Zone
185678.description:
The IT scientists have developed a new anti-virus robot. It can destroy all types of viruses: Trojans, worms and others. Lead the antivirus kernel through the file systems of different computers and clear them from viruses. Use only mouse to move. Good luck!

Source: The Game Website.

185679.name: Space Incident
185679.description:
User Summary

A violent UFO encounter leaves your ship disabled and with two astronauts and one 'ufologist' you seek to repair and return your ship caught between Mars and Earth.

The only catch is that you are the AI and can only accomplish most task by talking (and calming down) the crew members. There are 10 different endings to the game, ranging from complete success to losses of crew and/or space shuttle.

185680.name: Mini Heroes
185680.description:
Latest update:
- Added a speed button to battles, which will speed battle time up.
- Removed time limit to reset character
- Removed username swear filter that was denying some usernames from playing the game
- Fixed an uncommon bug that froze when you used potions

An all new multiplayer, adventure game experience. Battle monsters and explore dungeons with friends. Capture, Breed and Raise pets to show-off and fight along your side. Customize your own plot of land to your liking. Craft over 1000 unique items!
